thread.title: BRIEF-Taiwan's Cathay Financial China unit brings in Alibaba's Ant Financial as strategic investor
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Taiwan's Cathay Financial China unit brings in Alibaba's Ant Financial as strategic investor

title: BRIEF-Taiwan's Cathay Financial China unit brings in Alibaba's Ant Financial as strategic investor
text:
BRIEF-Taiwan's Cathay Financial China unit brings in Alibaba's Ant Financial as strategic investor Sept 14 
Sept 14 Cathay Financial Holding Co Ltd : 
* Says Alibaba's Ant Financial to invest in Cathay's property insurance unit in China 
* Says Ant Financial to invest 1.2 billion yuan ($188.5 million) in its China property insurance unit as strategic investor 
* Says Ant Financial to hold 60 percent of its China property insurance unit after investment 
* Ant Financial is the finance affiliate of Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. It runs China's most popular online payment platform, Alipay(1 US dollar = 6.3664 Chinese yuan) (Reporting by Faith Hung) Trending On Reuters
